QuestData.Title: Will of the Genesaur
QuestData.Description: When the goren attacked we threw everything we had at them but they just kept comin'.$b$bSo some of the lads went and stole a fancy artifact from the botani.$b$bProblem was we couldn't get it to work. Now the artifact is sitting at the bottom of the bastion. To get to it you got to go all the way to the back of the tunnels past all them goren and find the wee tunnel that takes you farther underground.$b$bIf you retrieve it, it is yours.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Will of the Genesaur.
QuestData.CompletionText: Not fond of this place. If the plants ain't tryin' to kill you then the ground is tryin' to swallow ya up.
QuestData.RewardText: That artifact was useful until it ran out of juice. Hopefully you got some seeds and water for it.
